attacks.name: Sting Turn
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed and switch Gligar with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Tail Sting
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is Pokémon-ex, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage and the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.
